event-not-bookable: The selected event is currently not available
tickets-already-booked-content: Some of the tickets you have chosen are already booked or reserved and thus have been reset.
ticket-reservation-error-content: An error occurred while the reservation of your tickets, but don't panic. You can still continue your booking, just be aware, that others can be faster than you.
seat-reservation-time-over: The time when your tickets are reserved is over, however you can continue with the booking process, without blocked seats.
number-of-tickets-unavailable: {{ticketAmount}} tickets of your order are unavailable
choose-continue: Please select an event and press continue (lower right corner)
